channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Directly outside 43 Leverton Street, 27th February
item.description:
Resident reports quite a large amount of water leaking from this cover, with potential to flood her property. Please investigate as a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Leverton Street, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Fly Tipping on Street problem has been found, 27th February
item.description:
2 green recycling bags full of general waste have been left on the road outside 138 Tottenham Road
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tottenham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bag and other rubbish on pavement, 27th February
item.description:
Dog poo bag and other rubbish on pavement almost opposite CMC motors on Cromwell road. It’s on the ‘odd’ side of the road quite near to Croydon road (near 2nd tree when entering Cromwell road from Croydon road) not sure how long it has been there as just walked that way. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cromwell Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 31 Brand Street running electrical cable over pavement, 27th February
item.description:
Loose car charging cable repeatedly run across the pavement. Aside from being a trip hazard there is a charging point at the top of the road so no excuse.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brand Street, Greenwich

item.title: Dumped house furniture, 27th February
item.description:
I have reported this before. It's been weeks now since these furniture items have been dumped outside 2 Adys road. It's a health and safety hazard as well as an eye sore. Does someone need to fall over them for the council to pick them up? I would be really grateful to hear why this has not be sealed with already.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Adys Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
